titleStmt.title: Animadvertions on the papists most wicked and bloody oath of secrecy given to Robert Bolron by William Ruston a Jesuit, for the murdering of kings, princes, and their people, and carrying on their devilish and hellish designs for subverting the Protestant religion in England and Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Bolron, Robert, fl. 1674-1680.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
